The longer I'm here the further my time horizon grows.

When I first found CT early '17 I saw it all as little more than a opportunity to make a quick buck.

Thinking more and more these days how I want to be involved in 10, 20 years time.

I have the deepest respect for hardcore nerds reading and writing crypto tech and research at the bleeding edge. The 1%.

Doing my best consulting, listening to these guys, playing catch up on everything technical so I can break it down and communicate as simple as possible.
If you haven't made money recently don't worry you're still a genius. The market just isn't pumping right now.

I take big size positions for big swings when I have big confidence.

Small scalps, squeezing money out of a range, etc, is not interesting to me.

No big confidence lately, will post trades again when it is back.

What makes me happy and fulfilled is consistent exercise, consistent sleep, consistent nutrition, and time outside in the sun.

So simple, but easy to fall off track. Junk snacks, late nights, skipped workouts bc not feeling it.

I'm making it a priority to stay in a good loop.
